Package org.Controller

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
org.Controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController extends Object
Class to keep the global operation required on players to be kept at one single location

      Validity check for checking if the player exists
      Parameters:
      p_playerName - : String player name of the player for checking validity
      Returns:
      True or False based on if player exist in the game.

    • updateContinents

      public void updateContinents(Player p_player, GameState p_gameState)
      Helper function to add continents to the list of captured continent of the player , according to the countries captured.
      Parameters:
      p_player - : Player on whose countries this operation will take place.
      p_gameState - : Gamestate of the game.

    • showPlayerAssignedCountry

      public void showPlayerAssignedCountry(GameState p_gameState)
      Helper function to render the assigned countries to a player
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - : Current gamestate of the main running game.

    • assignCountries

      public void assignCountries(GameState p_gameState)
      Handles the assigncountries command from users. And assigns random country to each of the player.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - : Current game state of the Game.

    • calculateArmiesForPlayer

      public Integer calculateArmiesForPlayer(Player p_player)
      Calculates reinforcement to be provided to the players , after each turn.
      Parameters:
      p_player - : For player whose reinforcement number has to be decided.
      Returns:
      Integer : The number of reinforcement .
